meanings.definition: The action or process of accepting or being accepted.
meanings.sent1: Her acceptance of the award brought tears to her eyes.
meanings.sent2: The school announced the acceptance of all students into the program.
meanings.sent3: His acceptance of the challenge with a smile surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: The acceptance of new ideas is like opening a door to endless possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The warm acceptance of the puppy into the family filled the house with joy.

meanings.definition: The state of being accepted or acceptable.
meanings.sent1: The team celebrated their acceptance into the championship game.
meanings.sent2: The acceptance of her apology by her friend healed their relationship.
meanings.sent3: The acceptance of the invitation to the party made her day brighter.
meanings.sent4: The acceptance of different cultures enriches our society.
meanings.sent5: The acceptance of the new policy by employees improved workplace morale.

meanings.definition: Willingness to tolerate a difficult or unpleasant situation.
meanings.sent1: His acceptance of the long wait at the doctor's office showed patience.
meanings.sent2: The acceptance of the rainy weather with a smile lifted everyone's spirits.
meanings.sent3: Her acceptance of the traffic jam turned into a fun sing-along session.
meanings.sent4: The acceptance of life's challenges is like building inner strength.
meanings.sent5: The acceptance of setbacks as learning opportunities leads to growth.
